body: After giving this some more thought, I'd like to propose a different set of experiment types, to better capture what we're trying to do here. Specifically, "rollout" is not specifically the thing we're trying to filter out. We're trying to filter out high population recipes. Because of this, I propose `shield-pref` and `shield-pref-highpop`. I think this conveys the idea better.

body_html: After giving this some more thought, I'd like to propose a different set of experiment types, to better capture what we're trying to do here. Specifically, "rollout" is not specifically the thing we're trying to filter out. We're trying to filter out high population recipes. Because of this, I propose shield-pref and shield-pref-highpop. I think this conveys the idea better.
